caseTitle: Speaker National Assembly of Pakistan, Islamabad v. Habib Akram, etc
tagline: Comparing Nomination Forms for candidates of NA and PA issued in terms of Election Act, 2017 with those issued in terms of ROPA, 1976, it appears that the omissions would facilitate the determination of the qualification or disqualification of a candidate and would lead to greater transparency regarding the credentials of a candidate facilitating the electorate in making a more informative choice and therefore the candidates are required to submit an affidavit disclosing the requisite information omitted by the Elections Act, 2017 along with the nomination papers with RO failing which would render the Nomination Papers incomplete and liable to rejection.
